title: Patal Gange - River of the Gods

description: The search for clean water and the education of children and adults of an Indian village ti the perils of contaminated supplies. With the advice and blessing of the village seer and priest, respectively, a UNICEF rig accompanies the drilling of a well to make clean, fresh water available to people in a village.
